basic.blooming: Flowering period May-July, fruiting period July-September
basic.color: Flower color yellow, flower color yellow, fruit color orange yellow or cyan

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients, pH value between 6-8
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, high quality fruits in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Slight drought tolerance, water thoroughly when soil surface is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Like fertilizer very much, apply more fertilizer during fruiting time
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
